item.description:
The Melting Pot is having 80's night. See attached link for all of the details. Let's get dressed up 80's style (optional) and enjoy each other's company while we dip our way though a 3 Course Meal.

The cost will be $35 per person (plus tax and tip) and does NOT include any drinks. Please bring cash as it will make it easier to spit the bill at the end of the evening.

I made reservations for 20 people and any changes to the reservation must by made by February 22nd if we don't want to be charged a "large party fee", therefore I'm going to need your RSVP by February 21st. Sorry!!

Hope you see you there because it's going to be "Like, Totally Awesome Dude!!!!"



Lhttp://www.meltingpot...
item.name: Melt into the 80's
